code: import*as constants from"../../../constants/unitActionTypes.js";export var getAllUnits=function getAllUnits(){return{type:constants.GET_ALL_UNITS};};export var createUnit=function createUnit(unit){return{type:constants.CREATE_UNIT,payload:unit};};export var updateUnit=function updateUnit(unit){return{type:constants.UPDATE_UNIT,payload:unit};};export var deleteUnit=function deleteUnit(id){return{type:constants.DELETE_UNIT,payload:id};};export var cleanUp=function cleanUp(){return{type:constants.CLEAN_UP};};
